Class Country

  • java.lang.Object
    • Country

  • public class Country
extends java.lang.Object
    A Contry is a collection of cities and roads between them, all part of a game.
    Version:
    (a version number or a date)
    Author:
    Jens Kristian Nielsen & Thomas Vinther

      Returns the list of cities within the country.

      Returns a City with the given name, or null if no such city exists within the Country.

      Returns a reference to the Game that we are playing.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of the country.
      java.util.Map<City,java.util.List<Road>> getNetwork()
      Returns the infrastructure network of the Country, a Map that maps a City to a List of Road objects.
      java.util.List<Road> getRoads(City c)
      Returns the list of Roads starting in the given City, if and only if the City lies within the borders of the Country.
